actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States, Canada, Great Britain, Western Europe and Japan should act in concert in refusing to sell essential industrial and food products, and medicines to Arab nations boycotting such nations in the sale of petrochemicals.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United States, Canada, Great Britain, Western Europe, and Japan should act in concert in refusing to sell essential industrial and food products, and medicines to Arab nations boycotting such nations in the sale of petroleum.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States, Canada, Great Britain, Western Europe and Japan should act in concert in refusing to sell essential industrial and food products, and medicines to Arab nations boycotting such nations in the sale of petrochemicals.
